definition: capital of a country
abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)
city walls/city/town/CL:座[zuo4],道[dao4],個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: With special renovation, Beijing will again take on the scene it once had, complete with its historical rivers and classical gardens.
sentences.chinese: 通過專項整治，再現京城水系和古典園林的歷史風貌。

sentences.english: Chen Wenjie holds geminate leg maimed person, climbing beggar arrive for Chen Qingyun capital.
sentences.chinese: 陳文傑裝成雙腿殘廢，爬着要飯供陳青雲到京城。

sentences.english: City people call this "dragon sun-and-rain fish".
sentences.chinese: 京城的百姓們稱這種爲“龍睛魚”。

sentences.english: Within three days, they were at the walls of the capital of the republic.
sentences.chinese: 三天後，他們就兵臨國都南京城下。

sentences.english: And Saul came to the city of Amalek and lay in wait in the valley.
sentences.chinese: 掃羅到了亞瑪力的京城，在谷中設下埋伏。

sentences.english: Shunzhi of the Qing Dynasty, in the capital of "Man-Han-city living."
sentences.chinese: 清初順治年間，在京城實行“滿漢分城居住”。

sentences.english: Old villages surrounded by the expanding city are being demolished.
sentences.chinese: 被擴展中的北京城所包圍的老村莊正被拆毀。

sentences.english: Zhoukoudian is a village of Fangshan County, about 50km from Beijing .
sentences.chinese: 周口店是北京房山縣的一個鎮，距北京城約50公里。

sentences.english: Only the peony is really a national beauty with its bloom shocking the capital.
sentences.chinese: 唯有牡丹真國色，花開時節動京城。

sentences.english: He returned to the capital with the same simple luggage.
sentences.chinese: 從廣州返回京城時，他仍然只有簡單的行李。

sentences.english: Bela the son of Beor, and the name of his city Denaba.
sentences.chinese: 貝敖爾的兒子貝拉在厄東作王，他的京城名叫丁哈巴。

sentences.english: Neat Vegetable Garden in the City of Nanking, China.
sentences.chinese: 南京城內一處規整的小菜園。

sentences.english: The script of Zhengzi-opera emanates from Qingyangqiang of Ming Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 正字戲《京城會》劇本出自明代青陽腔。

sentences.english: Beijing Urban Construction Group Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 北京城建集團有限責任公司。

sentences.english: Winding its way through the northwest of Beijing, Yongding River is the biggest river in the city.
sentences.chinese: 蜿蜒於京城西北的永定河是北京最大的河流。

sentences.english: This is what I said the number one gathering place of the tramps in the capital.
sentences.chinese: 這裏就是我所說的京城頭號盲流聚集地。

definition: capital of a country (literary)
Yanjing, an old name for Beijing/capital of Yan at different periods
Bianjing, Northern Song capital, now called Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1], Henan
imperial capital
prince's mansion
Imperial City, inner part of Beijing, with the Forbidden City at its center
imperial palace
old name of Kaifeng 開封|开封[Kai1 feng1]
to enter the capital/to go to Beijing
provincial capital
imperial capital
Gyeonggi Province, South Korea, surrounding Seoul and Incheon, capital Suweon City 水原市[Shui3 yuan2 shi4]
capital city and its surrounding area
to return to the capital
historical name of Shenyang 瀋陽|沈阳 in modern Liaoning province
the Forbidden City/the Imperial Palace in Beijing/same as 故宮|故宫[Gu4 gong1]
Peiping or Beiping (name of Beijing at different periods, esp. 1928-1949)
